children_0-2: Use extremely simple language, 1-2 very short paragraphs, strong repetition, sensory words, and gentle sound effects.
children_3-6: Use clear problem-solution arcs, 2-4 concise paragraphs, playful verbs, light sound effects, and only 2-3 characters per scene.
children_7-10: Use engaging action and humor, 4-8 paragraphs, 2-4 sentences each, clear stakes, and age-appropriate vocabulary.
children_11-14: Include emotional stakes and curiosity hooks, 6-12 paragraphs, 5-8 sentences each, with reflection moments.
young_adult_15-17: Use mature themes, nuanced relationships, and tension; allow complex sentences and interiority.
adult_18+: Use full narrative complexity, layered themes, and sophisticated prose.
all_ages: Keep language broadly accessible, warm tone, and balanced pacing for mixed audiences.
